title: Nature Nuts with Julian Clary
overview: Julian Clary travels all over the UK in this three-part series, discovering an extraordinary range of nature fans obsessed by the creatures in their backyards and beyond. Julian and his expert film crew, boasting some of the UK's most talented natural history cameramen and women, play fairy godmother to our Nature Nuts by capturing sight of their favourite creatures in ways they've never seen before.With some of the best new technology including starlight, high speed, mini aerial and underwater cameras, the Nature Nuts are given once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to watch their favourite animals in their natural habitat.Jam-packed with Julian's trademark humour, Nature Nuts with Julian Clary is full of great characters and fantastic wildlife footage. Each week Julian meets four Nature Nuts and finds out about four species of wonderful wildlife in Britain.
